name: Let's go Vaxxo
description:
The game follows an atypical work day of a nurse as they help vaccinate different people while trying to overcome the challenges and difficulties that are presented to them by each patient. The different patients each have their own challenges and the nurse must successfully vaccinate each patient without making too many mistakes in order to not stress the patients out. 

Please press the restart game button on the menu screen if you want to replay the game from the beginning.

We are just year 1 students from RP game design. Please give us comments for improvement
